title: cc-format Configuration
description: Configuration schema for cc-format (CLion CMake Format)

useTabs.description: Use tabs for indentation instead of spaces

tabSize.description: Number of spaces equivalent to one tab character

indentSize.description: Number of spaces for each indentation level

continuationIndentSize.description: Additional indentation for continued lines in multi-line commands

keepIndentOnEmptyLines.description: Preserve indentation whitespace on empty lines

spaceBeforeCommandDefinitionParentheses.description: Add space before parentheses in function and macro definitions

spaceBeforeCommandCallParentheses.description: Add space before parentheses in regular command calls

spaceBeforeIfParentheses.description: Add space before parentheses in if/elseif/else/endif statements

spaceBeforeForeachParentheses.description: Add space before parentheses in foreach/endforeach loops

spaceBeforeWhileParentheses.description: Add space before parentheses in while/endwhile loops

spaceInsideCommandDefinitionParentheses.description: Add space inside parentheses in function and macro definitions

spaceInsideCommandCallParentheses.description: Add space inside parentheses in regular command calls

spaceInsideIfParentheses.description: Add space inside parentheses in if/elseif/else/endif statements

spaceInsideForeachParentheses.description: Add space inside parentheses in foreach/endforeach loops

spaceInsideWhileParentheses.description: Add space inside parentheses in while/endwhile loops

maxBlankLines.description: Maximum number of consecutive blank lines to preserve

lineLength.description: Maximum line length before wrapping (0 means unlimited)

alignMultiLineArguments.description: Align arguments vertically in multi-line commands

alignMultiLineParentheses.description: Align closing parenthesis with opening line in multi-line commands

alignControlFlowParentheses.description: Align control flow statement parentheses in multi-line format
